column3: [e.arˈraːme]}}) was the great ship of [[Tuor]] in which he and [[Idril]] sailed into the West. It was a tradition under the [[Eldar]] and [[Edain]] that they arrived in [[Valinor]], bypassing the [[Ban of the Valar]].<ref name="Gondolin">{{S

column1: Tolkien provides a direct translation for ''Eärrámë'' within ''[[The Silmarillion]]'': "Sea-Wing".<ref name="Gondolin"/> This comes from ''[[eär]]'' "sea" and ''[[rámë]]'' "wing".
